li.a: Region 8 Title 3 Family and Community Engagement
Region 8 Title 3 Family and Community Engagement

div.p:
Due to an abundance of caution in regards to COVID-19, Malta ISD will be closed until May 1, 2020 with the potential of a longer extension.
Malta ISD will continue to consult with local and state health officials. Please continue to monitor the school Facebook page, as well as your classroom teacher’s page (Class Dojo, Google Classroom, Facebook) for upcoming announcements.
Thank you for your continued patience and support as we prioritize the health and safety of our students and staff.
Sincerely,
Stacy Starrett, Superintendent
Get all the latest information about our elementary school!
View our quick links to get to our most visited web pages

p.a:

New Boston, Texas 75570

div.p: Our mission is to provide a safe school environment that will produce quality education for all students to improve learning and enhance student achievement.
